source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video features a slow pan across a dimly lit, wood-paneled attic. Red string lights are strung across the ceiling, casting a reddish glow on the scene. A black and white photograph of two hands hangs from a line, and a chair covered in a white sheet is visible.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a slow pan across a dimly lit, wood-paneled attic. Red string lights are strung across the ceiling, casting a reddish glow on the scene. A black and white photograph of two hands hangs from a line, and a chair covered in a white sheet is visible.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the setting but fails to detail the full, chronological motion of the camera as required. It only mentions a "slow pan across" but omits that the camera first pans to the right to reveal a hallway and then pans back to the left, returning to near its original position. The description should be revised to chronologically detail this two-part camera movement.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video opens in a dimly lit, wood-paneled attic where red string lights are strung across the ceiling, casting a reddish glow. The initial focus is on a black and white photograph of two hands hanging from a line. The camera then pans slowly to the right, revealing a narrow, dark hallway with louvered walls. Subsequently, the camera pans back to the left, settling on a wider view that includes the hanging photograph, a chair draped in a white sheet, and a wooden dresser.
